name: Wendigo
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

actions.desc: The wendigo makes three attacks: two with its icy claw and one with its bite. Alternatively, it uses its Frozen Spittle twice.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage and 14 (4d6) cold damage.
actions.name: Icy Claw

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 100 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (8d6) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Frozen Spittle

special_abilities.desc: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the wendigo must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed by gnawing cold and crippling hunger for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the wendigo’s Aura of Starvation for the next 24 hours.
special_abilities.name: Aura of Starvation

special_abilities.desc: The wendigo has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
